document.full_text: jeremy lamb scored just 12 points in connecticut's 53-41 victory over butler in the ncaa basketball championship game monday but he was at his best when it mattered most.
document.title: lamb pulls huskies through as walker misfires
lines_and_colors: jeremy lamb scored just 12 points in connecticut's 53-41 victory over butler in the ncaa basketball championship game monday but he was at his best when it mattered most.
